languages.text: {n}Ханн бледнеет, но поднимает голову. После минуты молчания он говорит хрипло:{/n} "Вы правы. Я слишком долго сопротивлялся неизбежному".
{n}Hann grows pale, but raises his head. After a minute's pause, he says hoarsely,{/n} "You're right. I've been struggling against the inevitable for too long."
languages.original_text: {n}Ханн бледнеет, но поднимает голову. После минуты молчания он говорит хрипло:{/n} "Вы правы. Я слишком долго сопротивлялся неизбежному".

{n}Hann grows pale, but raises his head. After a minute's pause, he says hoarsely,{/n} "You're right. I've been struggling against the inevitable for too long."

languages.text: {n}ハンは青ざめたが、頭を上げた。1分ほど沈黙した後、彼が声を荒げて言った。{/n}「そのとおりです。私はあまりにも長い間、避けられないものに抗い続けてきました」
languages.original_text: {n}Hann grows pale, but raises his head. After a minute's pause, he says hoarsely,{/n} "You're right. I've been struggling against the inevitable for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハンは青ざめたが、頭を上げた。1分ほど沈黙した後、彼が声を荒げて言った。{/n}「そのとおりです。私はあまりにも長い間、必然に抗い続けてきました」

languages.text: {n}汉恩脸色苍白，但还是抬起了头。他沉默了一分钟之久，随后沙哑地开了口。{/n}“您说得没错，我已经与那不可避免的结果抗争得太久了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hann grows pale, but raises his head. After a minute's pause, he says hoarsely,{/n} "You're right. I've been struggling against the inevitable for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}汉恩脸色苍白，但还是抬起了头。他沉默了一分钟之久，随后沙哑地开了口。{/n}“您说得没错，我已经与那不可避免的结果抗争得太久了。”

languages.text: {n}Hann palidece, pero levanta la cabeza. Tras un minuto de pausa, responde con voz ronca:{/n} «Tiene razón. He luchado demasiado tiempo contra lo inevitable».
languages.original_text: {n}Hann grows pale, but raises his head. After a minute's pause, he says hoarsely,{/n} "You're right. I've been struggling against the inevitable for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann palidece, pero levanta la cabeza. Tras un minuto de pausa, responde con voz ronca:{/n} «Tiene razón. He luchado demasiado tiempo contra lo inevitable».

languages.text: {n}Hann pâlit, mais relève la tête. Au bout de quelques instants, il finit par dire d'une voix rauque :{/n} « Vous avez raison. Voilà bien trop longtemps que je lutte contre l'inévitable. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hann grows pale, but raises his head. After a minute's pause, he says hoarsely,{/n} "You're right. I've been struggling against the inevitable for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann pâlit, mais relève la tête. Au bout de quelques instants, il finit par dire d'une voix rauque :{/n} « Vous avez raison. Voilà bien trop longtemps que je lutte contre l'inévitable. »

languages.text: {n}Hann erblasst, hebt aber den Kopf. Nach einer Minute Stille sagt er heiser:{/n} "Ihr habt recht. Ich habe zu lange gegen das Unvermeidliche gekämpft."
languages.original_text: {n}Hann grows pale, but raises his head. After a minute's pause, he says hoarsely,{/n} "You're right. I've been struggling against the inevitable for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann erblasst, hebt aber den Kopf. Nach einer Minute Stille sagt er heiser:{/n} "Ihr habt recht. Ich habe zu lange gegen das Unvermeidliche gekämpft."

languages.text: {n}Hann'ın beti benzi atsa da başını dikleştiriyor. Bir dakika kadar duraksadıktan sonra boğuk bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Haklısınız. Kaçınılmaz olana karşı bu kadar uzun süre direndiğim yeter."
languages.original_text: {n}Hann grows pale, but raises his head. After a minute's pause, he says hoarsely,{/n} "You're right. I've been struggling against the inevitable for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann'ın beti benzi atıyor ancak başını dikleştiriyor. Bir dakika boyunca duraksadıktan sonra boğuk bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Haklısınız. Kaçınılmaz olana karşı bu kadar uzun süre direndiğim yeter."
